title: Eve of Sin City
description: Sin City - Las Vegas - is home to humans and Infernals of all sorts: the good, the bad, and the ugly.... If you ask Evangeline Hollis, "good" is in short supply, "ugly" might be amusing, but "bad" is most definitely her business. Eve is a Mark, a heavenly bounty hunter, and Las Vegas is her territory.
author: Sylvia Day
